    Class
    Description
    BaseRandom
     
    CheckedRandom
    A checked random that fails fast when it detects concurrent usage.
    ChunkRandom.RandomProvider
     
    GaussianGenerator
     
    Random
    A reimplementation of Random.
    RandomSeed.XoroshiroSeed
     
    RandomSequence
     
    RandomSequencesState
     
    RandomSplitter
    A random splitter represents necessary bits from a random that can be combined with other seeds to split a new random from the old one.
    Xoroshiro128PlusPlusRandom
    Xoroshiro128++ based pseudo random number generator.
    Xoroshiro128PlusPlusRandomImpl
    Implementation of Xoroshiro128++ pseudo-random number generator.
